title: Partnership Manager, Games - WWDR Japan
summary: Imagine what you could do here! The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries...
description:
-  Work with developers to bring Console and PC-class games to Apple devices across Mac, iPad, iPhone and Apple Vision Pro
-  Help discover and grow AA and indie titles into the next wave of hit games
-  Guide developers to build new genre-defining experience for Apple Vision Pro
-  Drive internal projects to build structure and scale out our gaming initiative globally
-  Go deep with top developers, understanding their roadmaps, and influencing at senior level
preferred_qualifications:
Direct experience working in the console and PC gaming industry
Solid understanding of industry trends in gaming and apps in Japan
Strong passion for games and Apple technologies
The ability to sell a vision of the future, exciting and motivating stakeholders
Operational prowess and attention to detail to design, plan, and execute on projects
Extremely proactive and goal-driven mentality
